alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Washington (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 4:52PM CDT until July 01 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CLINTON AND WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 451 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mascoutah to Willisville, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... New Baden, Lively Grove, and New Memphis around 455 PM CDT. Aviston, Okawville, and Albers around 500 PM CDT. Breese, Nashville, and Germantown around 505 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Carlyle, Beckemeyer, Ashley, Centralia, Wamac, Irvington and Shattuc. This includes Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 34 and 61. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
